hero.subtitle: 16-year-old software developer passionate about modern web technologies

about.title: About
about.heading: Passionate Developer from Turkey
about.description1: I'm a 16-year-old software developer with a deep passion for creating modern, efficient, and beautiful web applications. I love exploring new technologies and turning ideas into reality through code.
about.description2: My journey in programming started at a young age, and I've been constantly learning and growing ever since. I specialize in full-stack web development with a focus on modern JavaScript frameworks and best practices.

projects.title: Featured
projects.subtitle: Enterprise-level software projects developed for real clients
projects.ctaDescription: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision.

stokpro.title: StokPro - Inventory Management System
stokpro.description: Enterprise inventory management platform with advanced stock tracking, barcode scanning, automated order suggestions, and multi-warehouse management.

finansmax.title: FinansMax - Accounting Software
finansmax.description: Complete accounting system with invoicing, income-expense tracking, account management, cash/bank integration, and comprehensive reporting features.

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Premium Platform
ecommerce.description: Complete e-commerce solution with multi-vendor marketplace, live payment integration, shipment tracking, admin panel, and advanced analytics.

corporate.title: Corporate Website Solutions
corporate.description: SEO-optimized, fast, modern, and mobile-responsive corporate websites with CMS integration, multi-language support, and admin panel.

restopos.title: RestoPOS - Restaurant Management System
restopos.description: Complete restaurant automation system with table management, order tracking, kitchen display, POS integration, and comprehensive reporting.

crm.title: CRM & Sales Tracking System
crm.description: Customer relationship management with sales funnel, automated email campaigns, task management, and detailed reporting system.

blog.title: Latest
blog.ctaTitle: Want to see what I've built?
blog.ctaDescription: Check out my portfolio of enterprise-level projects and innovative solutions, or get in touch to discuss your next project.

contact.title: Get In
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind or want to collaborate? Feel free to reach out. I'm always open to discussing new opportunities and ideas!
contact.connectDescription: I'm currently available for freelance work and full-time opportunities. Let's build something amazing together!
